name: A4 Drawing From Your Photo/s (drawing shown as an example)
description:
How to order your original pencil portrait:

1 - Select the 'Buy it Now' option and proceed through checkout. I will then contact you with an email or postal address to send your photo to.

2 - Send me your photo. The more in focus the photo the better as this enables me to include more detail in your drawing. For A4 and A3 size portraits please allow 1-2 weeks for completion, 3 weeks for A2 size. 

3 - I am happy to email a photo or scan of your completed drawing prior to payment for your approval. This will be watermarked but don't worry, there will not be a watermark on your actual drawing.

4 - I will post your completed drawing (sealed with a fixative spray) in a strong cardboard tube to ensure it arrives in perfect condition.  Delivery will be via Royal Mail Signed for Recorded Delivery - free of charge.

Any more questions please feel free to contact me.
richardgeorgeandrew@gmail.com
